name: Heritage Havoc
description:
In a world where moms and technology exist side by side, the player takes on the role of a young warrior who must prove their worth by battling their ancestors in the mystical woods. Each ancestor is a powerful mom who has honed their skills and abilities over generations, and the player must defeat each one to earn their respect and inherit their special moves.

As the player progresses through the family tree, they uncover the story of their heritage and the reasons why each ancestor is fiercely against technology  The player will discover that the special moves are the key to unlocking a powerful ancient skills that has been passed down through the generations of their family.

With each victory, the player grows stronger and gains new abilities, until they finally reach the final ancestor - the founder of the family and the greatest mother of them all. The player must defeat this final ancestor to claim the ancient magic and become the new champion of the family.

With its unique blend of magic and technology, fast-paced combat, and rich lore, the player will be drawn into a world of adventure and discovery as they fight to prove their worth and become the ultimate ancestor of their family..
